message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $130. I think it would be very valuable to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $120 for it. Looking forward to your response.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for something a bit closer to my original price. Would you consider $125?
Hello Alice, I've considered your offer and I'm willing to pay $122 for the product. I hope this meets in the middle for us.
